creator: shailesh.ofb@gmail.com
text:
I am running httpd 2.0.51 (RHEL 4).I am trying to protect certain directory
using .htaccess.Clients are seeing login Box but they are not able to login.As
with basic authentication,i am using passwd.It seems it is not able to excute
SUEXEC. When i see the error log,It seems it is searching that user in MySQL.i
have not mentioned MySQL anywhere.

creator: nick@webthing.com
text: No part of Apache 2.0 will attempt to access MySQL.

(In reply to comment #1)
> No part of Apache 2.0 will attempt to access MySQL.
creator: shailesh.ofb@gmail.com
